page.title: 09LIFESTYLE:A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I usually awake at approximately 7.45, wash and then dress in school uniform which consists of a grey skirt,white blouse with maroon and silver tie and grey jumper.I am usually just finishing breakfast of cereal and toast when Dad leaves for work at 8.00.Soon my friends call for me and we walk about three-quarters of a mile to school,saying "hello" to shop- keepers and people we meet.We play something like the Corner game before the bell rings for assembly.I sometimes play the recorder for the hymn.After assembly we might have Maths or English.We usually do both each morning.On a Monday morning,we have P.E..School dinner is at 12.00. I am a table monitor and I am in charge of seven younger children.After eating my dinner,I might go out to play except when I do (see P.10)
